creature

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • creature.Creature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Creatures

    public class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
implements Creatures
    Creates a creature with defined attributes

        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        name - name of the creature
        species - species of the creature
        description - description of the creature
        level - starting level
        hp - maximum HP of the creature
        weapon - weapon carried by the creature
